message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.CR. 

The paper deals with the problem of generating artificial data for training deep neural networks, specifically for person re-identification. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The paper proposes a new method for assigning virtual labels to the generated data, which involves regularization and semi-supervised learning, indicating a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The experiments involve using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for image analysis, which is a common technique in multimedia (cs.MM) research. Finally, the paper also discusses the potential security implications of their method, indicating a possible connection to cryptography (cs.CR).
